text.7_Chapter, 3_Tosefta: ... should a person/adam be overbearing, they say to him, the mosquito preceded you.
text.10_Chapter, 1_Tosefta: ...Said Rabbi Akiva: Rabbi Eliezer taught three-hundred laws about magic but I only learnt from him two things: Two collecting gourds—one who collects is exempt, one who collects is liable; one who does the deed is liable, one who does sleight of hand is exempt (see Mishnah Sanhedrin 7:11)...
text.6_Chapter, 4_Tosefta: ...Hillel the elder expounded seven hermeneutical principles before the elders of Betheira: kal vachomer, gezeirah shavah, shnei kethuvim, kllal ufrat, kayotze bo bemakom acher ("the same applies elsewhere" — i.e., binyan av), davar halamed me'inyano (and davar halamed misofo).
